extendedInfo.description: My new app is ready. CLOSE ENOUGH CLOCK LITE,Problems with Boca O'Clock:    "squeeze bug"    timekeeping stops on 1/1/2014.Virtues of Close Enough Clock Lite	"squeeze bug" fix	keeps time forever (relatively speaking)	any new code will go in Close Enough Clock Lite.Please uninstall Boca O'Clock (explained below) and install the new, better (also free) Close Enough Clock Lite. Thank you for using the experimental Boca O'Clock - Hal Harrison.Please remove Boca O'Clock completely with "Settings" > Applications > Manage applications > Boca O'Clock > Uninstall which removes the living wallpaper, the app, and your preferences completely. Now install CLOSE ENOUGH CLOCK LITE.key words: Boca clock
